item.name: access_to_following_modules
item.message: You have access to the following %d modules.

item.name: acp3_not_up_to_date
item.message: A newer version of the ACP3 is available. Click %1$shere%2$s to download the latest version.

item.name: acp3_up_to_date
item.message: You already use the most recent version of the ACP3.

item.name: config_edit_error
item.message: While editing the ACP3 configuration an error has occured.

item.name: config_edit_success
item.message: The ACP3 configuration has been edited successfully.

item.name: designs_edit_error
item.message: While switching the design an error has occured.

item.name: designs_edit_success
item.message: The design was successfully selected and can now be used.

item.name: error_update_check
item.message: It wasn\'t possible to establish a connection to the update server.

item.name: flood_barrier_description
item.message: Time in seconds, how long an user has to wait, before he can write a new entry

item.name: languages_edit_error
item.message: While switching the language an error has occured.

item.name: languages_edit_success
item.message: The language was successfully selected and can now be used.

item.name: maintenance_message_to_short
item.message: The maintenance message should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: mod_activate_error
item.message: While enabling the module an error has occured.

item.name: mod_activate_success
item.message: The module was successfully enabled and can now be used.

item.name: mod_deactivate_error
item.message: While disabling the module an error has occured.

item.name: mod_deactivate_forbidden
item.message: It is impossible to enable resp. disable this module.

item.name: mod_description
item.message: This module is responsible for the basic functions of the ACP3.

item.name: mod_rewrite_description
item.message: Only enable this, if you are using the Apache web server.

item.name: modules_found
item.message: All in all, there are %d modules registered.

item.name: optimisation_access_forbidden
item.message: During the optimisation process you don\'t have any access to the database!

item.name: php_date_function
item.message: see date function of PHP

item.name: select_entries_per_page
item.message: Please select, how many resultsets per page should be displayed

item.name: select_menu_item
item.message: Please select one of the above-noted menu items, to reach the desired action.

item.name: select_online_maintenance
item.message: Please selecr, wether the maintenance mode should be turned on or off

item.name: select_output
item.message: Please select, wether the backup should be output as a file or a text

item.name: select_sef_uris
item.message: Please select, wether search engine friendly URIs should be used, or not

item.name: select_sql_tables
item.message: Please select at least one SQL-table, that should be exported

item.name: sql_table_optimisation_description
item.message: The table optimisation eliminates the overhead, which is the result of many erasing and editing processes.

item.name: type_in_date_format
item.message: Please type in a date format

item.name: type_in_db_host
item.message: Please type in the hostname, which belongs to the database

item.name: type_in_db_name
item.message: Please type in the database name

item.name: type_in_db_username
item.message: Please type in the user name for the database

item.name: type_in_flood_barrier
item.message: Please type in, for how long an user can\'t submit new entries
